title.rendered: “IDF Forces Dismantle Hamas’ ‘Victory Square’: A Bold Stand Against Terrorist Glorification”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Golani fighters seized and destroyed a central square in the Shuja’iyya neighborhood – “Palestine Square” where Hamas erected a statue glorifying the disaster of the APC from Operation “Protective Edge” and where the hostages were released.

Commander of Battalion 13: “We are here, Battalion 13, in the place where the terrorist organization Hamas erected a statue glorifying the disaster that happened to the battalion in Protective Edge. We are sending a clear message to Hamas: to every such place where a statue like this is erected, we will arrive and destroy it.”

After Operation ‘Protective Edge’, the terrorist organization Hamas erected a Victory Square in the Shuja’iyya neighborhood, in the square a statue depicting a fist emerging from an APC and three disks, on one of them the name of Oron Shaul of blessed memory, whose body is held by the terrorist organization Hamas.
Today, the forces of the brigade combat team of Brigade 188 together with Battalion 13 of the Golani Brigade arrived at the square, took over the area and destroyed the statue.

Attached is a picture of the statue: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC18122023254

Attached are pictures from the destruction of the square and the statue: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC181220232654

Attached is footage from the destruction of the square and the statue: https://bit.ly/48kvPKu
